rules_text:
First mate – Your starting deck contains “[i]Frere et Soeur[/i]” and no nonlegendary nonland cards with even mana value. [i](If this card outside the game is your chosen first mate, you may swap it with a card in your opening hand.)[/i]
Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have challenge. [i](They can’t be blocked by more than one creature.)[/i]
